tool.name: CorrectChl

param.name: query
param.displayname: Type of query to select records to modify?
param.dialogReference:
This option will allow you to set what type of query is run to linear reference the records.

ALL - all records in the database

NEW - all records that don't currently have chl_corrected values

DATERANGE - records between two dates selected below

IDRANGE - records between two IDs selected below

param.name: date1
param.dialogReference: Begining date to update. Time does not matter.

param.name: date2
param.dialogReference: End date of range to update. Time does not matter.

param.name: id1
param.dialogReference:
Start water quality record ID to update.

Water quality record ID numbers can be found at water_quality.id

param.name: id2
param.dialogReference:
End water quality record ID to update.

Water quality record ID numbers can be found at water_quality.id

tool.summary: Updates the Chl_corrected values for water quality transect records using the data from the regression table, the date and the uncorrected chl value.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Updates the Chl_corrected values for water quality transect records using the data from the regression table, the date and the uncorrected chl value.
